statements: SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.8;
SELECT product_id, product_name, loss_ratio, profitability_metrics FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts;
SELECT AVG(loss_ratio) AS average_loss_ratio FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.8 ORDER BY loss_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE profitability_metrics < 0.5;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio, profitability_metrics FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY profitability_metrics;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE product_name LIKE 'Car%' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(loss_ratio), SUM(profitability_metrics) FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.7;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_premium FROM PortfolioMetrics ORDER BY total_premium DESC;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio, profitability_metric FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio < 0.5 ORDER BY profitability_metric ASC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioMetrics WHERE net_loss > 50000;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.8;
SELECT product_id, product_name, loss_ratio, profitability_metric FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts ORDER BY profitability_metric DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, loss_ratio FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio < 0.5 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(loss_ratio) AS average_loss_ratio, SUM(profitability_metric) AS total_profit FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio, profitability_metric FROM LiabilityInsuranceProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.5 AND profitability_metric < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityProducts;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM LiabilityProducts ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM LiabilityProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Portfolios WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Portfolios WHERE total_value > 10000;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityProducts;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM LiabilityProducts ORDER BY loss_ratio DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value, start_date FROM Portfolios WHERE total_value > 100000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT metric_id, profit_margin, return_on_investment FROM ProfitabilityMetrics WHERE profit_margin > 10 AND return_on_investment > 15 ORDER BY metric_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM LiabilityProducts UNION SELECT * FROM Portfolios;
SELECT * FROM loss_ratios ORDER BY loss_ratio DESC;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM loss_ratios WHERE loss_ratio > 0.5;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM loss_ratios WHERE loss_ratio < 0.3 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM profitability_metrics ORDER BY portfolio_name ASC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_premium FROM insurance_portfolios WHERE total_premium > 100000;
SELECT * FROM loss_ratios WHERE loss_ratio > 0.5 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio FROM loss_ratios WHERE loss_ratio < 0.3 ORDER BY loss_ratio ASC
SELECT portfolio_name, profitability FROM profitability_metrics WHERE profitability > 0.1 ORDER BY portfolio_name ASC
SELECT product_name, premium FROM liability_insurance_products WHERE premium < 1000 ORDER BY premium DESC
SELECT portfolio_name, total_premium FROM insurance_portfolios WHERE total_premium > 50000 ORDER BY total_premium ASC
SELECT * FROM LiabilityProducts;
SELECT product_name, premium_amount FROM LiabilityProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.5;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_premium_amount FROM Portfolios ORDER BY total_premium_amount DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM ProductCategories WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT product_name, loss_ratio, profitability FROM LiabilityProducts JOIN ProfitabilityMetrics ON LiabilityProducts.id = ProfitabilityMetrics.product_id;
SELECT product_name, premium_amount FROM LiabilityProducts WHERE loss_ratio > 0.5 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, premium_amount, loss_ratio FROM LiabilityProducts WHERE product_name LIKE '%Insurance%' AND loss_ratio < 0.3 ORDER BY loss_ratio ASC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_premium_amount, total_losses_amount FROM Portfolios WHERE total_premium_amount > 100000 ORDER BY total_losses_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT category_name FROM ProductCategories WHERE category_name IN ('Healthcare', 'Automotive', 'Technology') ORDER BY category_name;

SELECT product_name, portfolio_name, loss_ratio, profitability FROM LiabilityProducts JOIN ProductPortfolioMapping ON LiabilityProducts.id = ProductPortfolioMapping.product_id JOIN Portfolios ON Portfolios.id = ProductPortfolioMapping.portfolio_id WHERE loss_ratio < 0.4 ORDER BY profitability DESC LIMIT 5;
